npcMessage.comment: Welcome to Mos Eisley!  I'm Mayor Guh'rantt.  I hope you're enjoying your time here in this fair city, and if there's anything I can do for you, you just let me know.  Do you know the history of Mos Eisley?  It's a beautiful city, full of life and character and one of the best cantinas in the known galaxy.

playerMessage.comment: I want to learn about Brawler skills.
I hear this city is a little...
